sentences.en: A record a ship's speed , its progress, and any shipboard events of navigational importance.
sentences.cn: 对船速 、 船程以及船上发生的所有对航海有意义的事件的记载.

sentences.en: A record of a ship's speed , its progress, and any shipboard events of navigational importance.
sentences.cn: 对船速 、 船程以及船上产生的所有对航海有意义的事件的记录.

sentences.en: Antiaircraft gun : Artillery piece fired from the ground or shipBoard in defense against aerial attack.
sentences.cn: 高射炮: 从地面或甲板上射击的抵御空袭的火炮.

sentences.en: Between the Macphacts and the Davidsons, who were missionaries, there had arisen the intimacy of shipboard.
sentences.cn: 在麦克法茨一家和海外传教士戴维森一家之间, 产生了一种同舟共济的情谊.

sentences.en: Expect to find yourself shipboard quite suddenly and quite soon.
sentences.cn: 期待着发现你自己突然迅速地登上了飞船.

sentences.en: France was to turn her back on shipboard aviation for another ten years.
sentences.cn: 在法国,舰上飞行整整被推迟了十年.

sentences.en: However, it remains the only shipboard - submarine torpedo available for the PLA Navy.
sentences.cn: 然而, 它仍然是PLA海军可用的唯一舷侧反潜鱼雷.

sentences.en: Naval ship cable and shipboard cable are main products of the Pu Hong Cable Works.
sentences.cn: 舰、船用电缆是浦虹电缆厂的主要产品.

sentences.en: Starboard cruise service is the largest shipboard concessionaire in the world.
sentences.cn: 你们公司是世界上最大的邮轮免税店的承包商.

sentences.en: The shipboard computer could automatically alter course.
sentences.cn: 船上的电脑能够自动改变航线.

sentences.en: The shipboard effect of helicopter has adverse effect on the flight safety.
sentences.cn: 直升机的舰面效应影响舰载直升机的飞行安全.
